thread.title: Amid Oklahoma strike, some teachers look to Texas

title: Amid Oklahoma strike, some teachers look to Texas
text:
Amid Oklahoma strike, some teachers look to Texas 12:12pm EDT - 02:11 
Many Oklahoma teachers have found economic refuge below the state's border in Texas, where the average educator salary is 30 percent higher. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
